skillssc_help: Choose skills you want to learn or upgrade
twisterlastDescription: You must make last level twister
swamplastDescription: You must make last level swamp
meteoritelastDescription: You must make last level meteorite
quakelastDescription: You must make last level eartquake
supportlastDescription: You must make last level support
hypnoseslastDescription: You must create last level hypnoses
golemlastDescription: You must make last level golem
fireballlastDescription: You must make last level fireball
shieldlastDescription: You must make last level shield
lightninglastDescription: You must make last level lightning
normalmodeDescription: You must win %number% times in normal mode
blendmodeDescription: You must win %number% times in blind mode
noentrymodeDescription: You must win %number% times in sudden death mode
nightmodeDescription: You must win %number% times in night mode
strongmodeDescription: You must win %number% times in extra strong enemies mode
blastermodeDescription: You must win %number% times in blaster mode
zombieDescription: You must play %number% times in mummy/survival mode
getallbuildingsDescription: You must conquare all enemies buildings
playnomagicDescription: You must win %number% times in no magic mode
stageType1Description:
Normal

Play in normal mode.

Destroy all enemies.
You must complete this mode in order to open other modes
Other modes give more XP after victory
stageType2Description:
Blind mode


You won't be able to see enemies count.


1.5x XP in this mode

User Level Required:
8
stageType3Description:
No Magic


You won't be able to use magic spells.


2x XP in this mode

User Level Required:
15
stageType4Description:
Sudden death


If enemy capturess any of your buildings, you will lose.

3x XP

User Level Required:
11
stageType5Description:
Extra strong
enemies


The enemy's attack and defense are doubled.

2x XP in this mode

User Level Required:
33
stageType6Description:
Mummy Survival

Survive as long as you can, battle through hordes of mummies.

Other modes give more gold on stage

User Level Required:
5
stageType7Description:
Twilight Mode


Only a small spot of light will lead you to the victory.


1.5x XP in this mode

User Level Required:
21
stageType8Description:
Blaster Mode


Find the fallen star
and get
the secret weapon.



Must complete game
stageType1Title:
Congratulations!
You have passed
First Level
You are rewarded 5 skill points. Use them wisely.
stageType2Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
BLIND MODE
Play this mode to get more xp. You won't be able to see enemies count.
stageType3Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
NO MAGIC MODE
Play this mode to get more xp. You won't be able to use magic.
stageType4Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
SUDDEN DEATH MODE
Play this mode to get more xp. If enemy capturess any of your buildings, you will lose.
stageType5Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
EXTRA STRONG MODE
Play this mode to get more xp. The enemy's attack and defense are doubled.
stageType6Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
MUMMY SURVIVAL MODE
Survive as long as you can, battle through hordes of mummies.
stageType7Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
TWILIGHT MODE
Play this mode to get more xp. Only a small spot of light will lead you to the victory.
stageType8Title:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
BLASTER MODE
Play this mode for fun and to get more xp. Your troops now armed with alien blasters
raceAvaibleTitle:
Congratulations!
You have unlocked
NEW RACES
To play them, just go to main menu and start new game, your current progress will be saved
diary_text_5: today, once again, we tried to destroy Mummies.
